com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui

Class GuiLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.AbstractNode
      • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiContainer
        • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiLabel

  • public class GuiLabel
extends GuiContainer
    This GUI node represents a container containing text with the ability to auto adjust the container size depending on the size of the text.
    Author:
    Maxstupo

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiContainer

        backgroundColor, outlineColor, outlineStroke

      • Fields inherited from class com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.AbstractNode

        isVisible, screen

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAutoSizeSpacing()
      Returns the spacing between the label container and the text.
      int getMinAutoSizeHeight()
      Returns the minimum size the auto size will allow in height.
      int getMinAutoSizeWidth()
      Returns the minimum size the auto size will allow in width.
      GuiText getTextNode()
      Returns the text node within this label.
      boolean isAutoSizeHeight()
      Returns true if the height of this node will be auto sized when the text changes.
      boolean isAutoSizeWidth()
      Returns true if the width of this node will be auto sized when the text changes.

      Sets if the height of this node will be auto sized when the text changes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GuiLabel

        public GuiLabel(AbstractScreen screen,
                float localX,
                float localY,
                int width,
                int height,
                java.lang.String text)
        Create a new GuiLabel object.
        Parameters:
        screen - the screen that owns this node.
        localX - the local x position.
        localY - the local y position.
        width - the width of this node, if -1 isAutoSizeWidth() will be true.
        height - the height of this node, if -1 isAutoSizeHeight() will be true.
        text - the text of this label.
